scripts.build-all: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 yarn build-shared && yarn build-legacy && yarn build-ui && yarn build-root && yarn copy-build
scripts.build-shared: cd shared && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build-legacy: cd legacy && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build-root: cd root && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build-ui: cd ui && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.copy-build: mkdir -p build && yarn copy-root && yarn copy-legacy-assets && yarn copy-ui-css
scripts.clean-all: rm -rf build && yarn clean-monorepo && yarn clean-proxy && yarn clean-shared && yarn clean-legacy && yarn clean-ui && yarn clean-root
scripts.link-components: yarn link "@canonical/react-components" && yarn link "react" && yarn install
scripts.lint: yarn build-shared && yarn lint-legacy && yarn lint-ui && yarn lint-shared && yarn lint-root
scripts.test: yarn build-shared && yarn test-legacy && yarn test-ui && yarn test-shared
